Summary: Giant Black triangle with lights on tips. Stealth Blimp?
divs: Sighting Detailsme and three friends hanging out off of county road 640. We saw a giant triangular dark or black object with lights on the points. It came from the south and passed to the east of us. It was bigger than a 10 story office building. When I got home I searched Google for quite a while and the only thing I could find was a stealth blimp. If this is a stealth blimp, why hasnt the news reported it?
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around November 12th 2009
